question: In which season did Bursaspor win the Süper Lig championship?
asked_question_translated: En quelle saison Bursaspor a-t-il remporté le championnat de Süper Lig ?
answer: Bursaspor a remporté le championnat de Süper Lig lors de la saison 2009-2010.
answer_translated_eng: Bursaspor won the Süper Lig championship in the 2009-2010 season.
